      datasets---🤗 Fast, efficient, open-access datasets and evaluation metrics for Natural Language Processing and more in PyTorch, TensorFlow, NumPy and Pandas

      hacktoberfest-swag-list---Multiple companies give out swag for Hacktoberfest, and this repo tries to list them all.

dstotijn /

      hetty---Hetty is an HTTP toolkit for security research. It aims to become an open source alternative to commercial software like Burp Suite Pro, with powerful features tailored to the needs of the infosec and bug bounty community.

UnityTechnologies /

      open-project-1---Unity Open Project #1: Action-adventure

Asabeneh /

      30-Days-Of-React---30 days of Reac.js challenge is a step by step guide to learn React in 30 days. This challenge needs an intermediate level JavaScript knowledge. It is recommended to feel good at in JavaScript before you start React. Check out 30DaysOfJavaScript

EssayKillerBrain /

      EssayKiller_V2---基于开源GPT2.0的初代创作型人工智能 | 可扩展、可进化

dafriedman97 /

      mlbook---Repository for the free online book Machine Learning from Scratch (link below!)

kentcdodds /

      react-hooks---Learn React Hooks! 🎣 ⚛

rachitiitr /

      DataStructures-Algorithms---The best library for implementation of all Data Structures and Algorithms - Trees + Graph Algorithms too!

lydiahallie /

      javascript-questions---A long list of (advanced) JavaScript questions, and their explanations ✨

kentcdodds /

      react-fundamentals---Material for my React Fundamentals Workshop

NVIDIA /

      NeMo---NeMo: a toolkit for conversational AI

p4gefau1t /

      trojan-go---Go实现的Trojan代理，支持多路复用/路由功能/CDN中转/Shadowsocks混淆插件，多平台，无依赖。A Trojan proxy written in Go. An unidentifiable mechanism that helps you bypass GFW. https://p4gefau1t.github.io/trojan-go/

sukritishah15 /

      DS-Algo-Point---This repository contains codes for various data structures and algorithms in C, C++, Java, Python.

bradtraversy /

      design-resources-for-developers---Curated list of design and UI resources from stock photos, web templates, CSS frameworks, UI libraries, tools and much more

cortexproject /

      cortex---A horizontally scalable, highly available, multi-tenant, long term Prometheus.

discordjs /

      discord.js---A powerful JavaScript library for interacting with the Discord API

kentcdodds /

      react-performance---Let's make our apps fast ⚡

kentcdodds /

      advanced-react-hooks---Learn Advanced React Hooks workshop

laravel /

microsoft /

      PowerToys---Windows system utilities to maximize productivity

geekcomputers /

      Python---My Python Examples

zero-to-mastery /
